EmailTemplate.name: Medical history and upload ID Reminder 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Medical History Questionnaire Second Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{{Blood_Test__c.Contact_Name__c}}},
Further to your recent Blood Test request, we asked you to submit a Medical History Questionnaire online.
Weâ€™ll be unable to proceed without the completed Questionnaire, so we would be grateful if you would complete it as soon as possible.
Please follow the link below to submit your Questionnaire response:
Complete Questionnare < https://optimale.typeform.com/to/cj6EnJ1L#patient_id={{{Recipient.Patient_ID__c}}}&name={{{Blood_Test__c.Account_First_Name__c}}} >
We look forward to receiving your response. Please let us know if you have any questions,
Many thanks,
Optimale
Optimale Ltd, 71-75 Shelton Street, London, WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom
